description: This table stores mapping information associated with discrete data received from outside sources. This table only contains types of mappings which are not in the tables specific to their data type.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: MAP_DATA_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the data reference ID.

columns.name: MAP_DATA_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:

columns.name: MAP_CODE
columns.description: This item stores the mapping code associated with the coding system to represent the data.

columns.name: MAP_CODING_SYSTEM
columns.description: This item stores the mapping coding system associated with the code to represent the data.

columns.name: MAP_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the mapping code in its code system
